author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update the xml files related to HGCal for ConsData to make the layer types conformal to ones used in HGCal Types

#### PR validation:

Has been tested with overlap checks, miss-match ID vs position, muon tomography

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to CMSSW_16_0_X
title: Phase2-hgx365L Update the xml files related to HGCal for ConsData to make the layer types conformal to ones used in HGCal Types
